subject: Doping (Sports)
Steroids
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The United States Anti-Doping Agency is preparing to unveil a new report that includes witness testimony from top cyclists claiming that Lance Armstrong used performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: The United States Anti-Doping Agency is preparing to unveil a new report that includes witness testimony from top cyclists claiming that Lance Armstrong used performance-enhancing drugs.
